languages.text: За один раунд можно использовать только одну способность каждого поста. Время, необходимое для восстановления способности после использования, определяется случайно и может занимать до трех ходов.

Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.
languages.original_text: За один раунд можно использовать только одну способность каждого поста. Время, необходимое для восстановления способности после использования, определяется случайно и может занимать до трех ходов.

traits.locale_text: Only one ability of each post can be used per round. The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.
Only one ability of each post can be used per round. The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.
Only one ability from each post can be used per round. The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

languages.text: Solo se puede usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} un cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} antes de poder volver a usar una capacidad se determina aleatoriamente y tiene un máximo de 3 asaltos.
languages.original_text: Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Solo se puede usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} un cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} antes de poder volver a usar una capacidad se determina aleatoriamente y tiene un máximo de 3 asaltos.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}1ラウンド{/g}ごとに各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}から使用できる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はひとつのみ。アビリティが再び使えるようになるまでの{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}時間はランダムに決定され、最大3ラウンドかかる。
languages.original_text: Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}から使用できる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はひとつのみ。アビリティが再び使えるようになるまでの{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}時間はランダムに決定され、最大で3ラウンドかかる。

languages.text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一种{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。每种能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}随机决定，最长可能会长达三轮。
languages.original_text: Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一种{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。每种能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}随机决定，最长可能会长达三轮。

languages.text: Pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} kann nur eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} von jedem {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} genutzt werden. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}, bevor eine Fähigkeit wieder eingesetzt werden kann, wird zufällig bestimmt und kann bis zu 3 Runden dauern.
languages.original_text: Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} kann nur eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} von jedem {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} genutzt werden. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}, bevor eine Fähigkeit wieder eingesetzt werden kann, wird zufällig bestimmt und kann bis zu 3 Runden dauern.

languages.text: Une seule {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut être utilisée lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} permettant de réutiliser une capacité est déterminé de manière aléatoire et peut prendre jusqu'à 3 rounds.
languages.original_text: Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Une seule {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut être utilisée lors d’un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le délai de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g} permettant de réutiliser une capacité est déterminé de manière aléatoire et peut prendre jusqu'à 3 rounds.

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}mevki{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} sadece bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanabilir. Bir kabiliyetin yeniden kullanılabilmesi için gereken {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} rastgele belirlenir ve en fazla 3 raunt sürebilir.
languages.original_text: Only one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds.
